00014 static inline
00015 mpc_uint32_t swap32(mpc_uint32_t val) {
00016     const unsigned char* src = (const unsigned char*)&val;
00017     return 
00018         (mpc_uint32_t)src[0] | 
00019         ((mpc_uint32_t)src[1] << 8) | ((mpc_uint32_t)src[2] << 16) | ((mpc_uint32_t)src[3] << 24);
00020 }
